form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Brown introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Ohio & Erie Canal National Heritage Canalway.

section.header: Reauthorization of Ohio & Erie Canal National Heritage Canalway
section.text: Section 809 of the Ohio & Erie Canal National Heritage Corridor Act of 1996 (16 U.S.C. 461 note; Public Law 104â€“333; 122 Stat. 826; 127 Stat. 420) is amended by striking 2013 and inserting 2022.
